definition: Les Misérables (1862) by Victor Hugo 維克多·雨果|维克多·雨果[Wei2 ke4 duo1 · Yu3 guo3]

sentences.english: He told a heart-wrenching story of his childhood in the impoverished countryside.
sentences.chinese: 他講述了在貧困農村度過的悲慘童年的經歷。

sentences.english: I have also been an expert witness at a tragic accident when a belay failed.
sentences.chinese: 我也一直是確保失敗這種悲慘意外發生時的作證專家。

sentences.english: Her whole body quavered when she heard the sad news.
sentences.chinese: 她聽到那悲慘的消息後渾身顫抖。

sentences.english: As to black cats, Hallowmas is the most miserable day in a year.
sentences.chinese: 對於黑貓來說，萬聖節是一年中最“悲慘”的日子。

sentences.english: Jason died a poor death in the kingdom of Colchis.
sentences.chinese: 傑森悲慘地死在科爾切斯王國。

sentences.english: You're lying to jazz up your otherwise miserable life.
sentences.chinese: 你說謊調解你的悲慘生活。

sentences.english: The sad condition of these refugees would move a heart of stone to sympathy。
sentences.chinese: 這些難民的悲慘處境能使一個鐵石心腸動容。

sentences.english: McDull has to go to Wudang Mountain to study taijiquan.
sentences.chinese: 而悲慘的麥兜卻要到武當山上學太極。

sentences.english: She quavered out her bitter experience.
sentences.chinese: 她以顫抖的聲音講述她悲慘的遭遇。

sentences.english: Finally, and most tragically, Caliban becomes a parody of himself.
sentences.chinese: 最後，而且最悲慘地，醜陋變成一個他自己的。

sentences.english: She spoke at length about the plight of the refugees.
sentences.chinese: 她詳細地講述了難民們的悲慘境遇。

sentences.english: It is a tragic love story about black Americans along the coast of South Carolina. "Porgy And Bess" opened in Boston, Massachusetts, in nineteen thirty-five.
sentences.chinese: 這部小說講述的是南卡羅萊納州黑人悲慘的愛情故事。

sentences.english: Pagonis says each of the eight pilot countries surveyed had their own tragic stories to tell.
sentences.chinese: 帕格尼絲說，接受調查的八個國家各有悲慘的情況。

sentences.english: Men are most often the abject victims of such a statement.
sentences.chinese: 通常都是男性成爲這種宣言的悲慘受害者。

sentences.english: The Great Migration after the First World War can be regarded as the escape from the miserable life in the South.
sentences.chinese: 一戰後的大移民是黑人爲逃避南方悲慘生活的大逃亡。

sentences.english: She raved out her bitter fate.
sentences.chinese: 她語無倫次地訴說她悲慘的命運。

definition: to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
helpless/without choice/for lack of better option/grudgingly/willy-nilly/nolens volens/abbr. for 無可奈何|无可奈何[wu2 ke3 nai4 he2]
to grieve/to be broken-hearted/to feel deeply hurt
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
